milestone_description: Report detailing environmental impacts (sediment transport, water quality, habitats). Timeline appears in multiple drafts (Q2 2025 in one draft; Q4 2027 in another).
Report detailing economic impacts of the dams and their removal.
Study assessing socio-economic implications for local communities.
Report evaluating political climate and strategies to garner support.

milestone_title: Track Claiborne spillway structural damage assessment/repair planning
milestone_description: USACE reported spillway abutment wall collapse and ongoing investigation/repair planning (operations not impacted per story).
